bibl.title: New Documents Illustrating Early Christianity. 8. A Review of the Greek Inscriptions and Papyri published in 1984-85.
bibl.note: Some notable entries: The Government's Pursuit of Runaway Slaves. - Taxes on Donkeys in Roman Egypt. - Imperial Rescripts. - The Christian Symbol XMG.
